card_1.cardText:
> _“When you walk over this star, I want you to remember first of all that I love you. And this is about hard work. And good luck. And not a whole lot else. You define me. Not this wonderful spot in the pavement.”_

Jennifer Garner

card_10.cardText:
Garner received her star on The Hollywood Walk of Fame on Tuesday, accompanied by her children who apparently missed school, which she addressed by joking: "In the Garner family, fame matters more than education."

[view sources](https://smarthernews.com/18-08-21-qtd-jennifer-garner/)
